title: Bug 116829 - Label height doesn't change with label font modification
description:
Description: When the font size of a label is modified, the label height does not change immediately.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a label in the UI.
2. Modify the font size of the label.
3. Observe that the label height remains the same, regardless of the font size modification.
OB: The label height does not change after modifying the font size in the UI.
EB: After changing the label content, the label height should be adjusted according to the font size.
SR:
1. Create a label in the UI.
2. Modify the font size of the label.
3. Check if the label height adjusts accordingly.
